about_the_game:
Story

"The Durka: You will not die" is a visual novel in the fur genre, the plot of which takes place on the territory of the Russian Federation in an alternative reality. In this world, there are many organizations that either help the country or, on the contrary, harm it.

The main character, Mickey, gets a job in one of these organizations. Now, together with his friends, he must save his country and the world from Durka Corporation, using manned robots.

Characters


Mickey is an ordinary 17-year-old boy, kind and polite, but sometimes can use obscene words. He likes to play various video games and chat with his friends. Not very close to his father, but he has strong feelings for his girlfriend Lera.


Mysterious - a mysterious person at the age of 26. He may seem a little strict, but in reality he loves pineapples and is ready to give them to everyone he meets. Its appearance is always accompanied by strange events and places.


Lera is a 17-year-old friend of Mickey's. She is very kind, responsible and a little shy. Lera always fulfills her obligations and promises, and also hides her slight attraction to Mickey.


Veronica is a 17-year-old (not) friend of Mickey's. She is a very hot-tempered, energetic and athletic girl. Veronica is ready to beat up Mickey a little and always strives to be the first everywhere, except for school.

Key Features

  • Fascinating plot (optional)
  • Own characters
  • Storylines depend on your choice
  • Own music
  • No smoke from CS2
  • More sense (optional)
  • Made in Russia

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 308 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 308 MB available space

name: The Durka: You will (not) die - Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 and up
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 308 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and up

short_description: "The Durka: You will (not) die" is a visual novel in the genre of fur, the plot of which unfolds on the territory of the Russian Federation, in an alternate reality.
